ESP.ORIGINAL: ScrumpusRex

Delilah is a trainable companion that will follow you across the Mojave.
She can learn more medical skills as you visit different doctors across the desert.

Scn 00DelilahBook1Script
short ReadCatcher ; 0=hasn't read it, 1=read the book already
float DelilahStartReadingBook
Begin GameMode
If (ReadCatcher == 1) Return ElseIf (DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired == 0) Return ElseIf (DelilahMREF.IsInCombat == 1) Return ElseIf (ReadCatcher == 0) If DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahBook2 == 1)
; If ReadCatcher == 0 ; Set DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed ; EndIf
If GameDaysPassed - DelilahStartReadingBook >= 2 && DelilahMREF.IsInCombat == 0 PlayerREF.RemoveNote DelilahReadingCatcher DelilahMREF.ModAV Perception 1 ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgReadCatcher Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 0 Set ReadCatcher to 1 RewardXP 25 StopQuest Delilah1BookRead endif endif endif
END

scn BeatrixFXSCRIPT
float timer int reset int bump
begin gamemode
if reset == 0 VFSBeatrixREF.SetRestrained 1 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 0 1 1 1 imod FadeToBlack9sISFX set timer to 0 set bump to 0 set reset to 1 endif
set timer to timer + getsecondspassed
if timer > 1.5 && bump == 0 PlaySound NPCIdleScratchShoulder set bump to 1 endif elseif timer > 2 && bump == 1 PlaySound NPCIdleSwattingSlap set bump to 2 endif elseif timer > 2.3 && bump == 2 PlaySound NPCIdleScratchSelf set bump to 3 endif elseif timer > 2.5 && bump == 3 PlaySound NPCIdleSwattingSlap set bump to 4 endif elseif timer > 3.5 && bump == 4 PlaySound NPCIdleScratchSelf set bump to 5 endif elseif timer > 4.5 && bump == 5 PlaySound NPCFeralGhoulAlert set bump to 6 endif elseif timer > 5.5 && bump == 6 PlaySound NPCFeralGhoulAware set bump to 7 endif if timer > 9 set reset to 0 enableplayercontrols
if GameHour <= 23 set GameHour to GameHour + 1 else set GameDaysPassed to GameDaysPassed + 1 set Gamehour to 1 endif
set VFSBeatrixREF.iWorking to 0 VFSBeatrixREF.SetRestrained 0 VFSBeatrixREF.evp stopquest BeatrixFX endif
end

scn 00DelilahQuestScript
short Graduate short DoOnce short PlayerHasBook short Barked short DelilahStimpaks short DelilahMedicine short DelilahSuperStimpaks short DelilahHealing short DelilahSuperHealing short DoOnce
float DelilahStimpakTimer float cTimer
BEGIN GameMode
;;------------STIMPAK USE----------------------
If DelilahMREF.IsInCombat == 1 set DelilahStimpaks to DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak set DelilahSuperStimpaks to DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak set DelilahMedicine to DelilahMREF.GetAV Medicine set DelilahHealing to ( DelilahMedicine * 0.6 ) + 30 set DelilahSuperHealing to ( DelilahMedicine * 0.6 ) + 60 EndIf
If ( DelilahMREF.IsInCombat == 1 ) && ( DoOnce == 0 ) Set DelilahStimpakTimer to GetSecondsPassed Set DoOnce to 1 IF ( DelilahMREF.GetHealthPercentage < 0.40 ) && ( DelilahMREF.GetDead == 0 ) && ( DelilahMREF.GetUnconscious == 0 ) if ( DelilahSuperStimpaks > 0 ) && ( DelilahStimpakTimer > 15 ) DelilahMREF.RestoreAV Health DelilahSuperHealing set DelilahSuperStimpaks to DelilahSuperStimpaks - 1 set DelilahStimpakTimer to 0 Player.PlaySound NPCHumanUsingStimpak DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDFirstAid ShowMessage 00SStimpak DelilahMREF.RemoveItem NVSuperStimpak 1 set DoOnce to 0 elseif DelilahSuperStimpaks == 0 && DelilahStimpaks > 0 && DelilahStimpakTimer > 15 DelilahMREF.RestoreAV Health DelilahHealing set DelilahStimpaks to DelilahStimpaks - 1 set DelilahStimpakTimer to 0 Player.PlaySound NPCHumanUsingStimpak ShowMessage 00Stimpak DelilahMREF.RemoveItem Stimpak 1 set DoOnce to 0 elseif DelilahSuperStimpaks == 0 && DelilahStimpaks == 0 && DelilahStimpakTimer > 15 DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDGotAStim set DelilahStimpakTimer to 0 Set DoOnce to 0 endif ENDIF EndIf
;;----------COMBAT BARKS---------------------- If DelilahMREF.IsInCombat == 1 && cTimer >= 300 DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDCombatBarks Set cTimer to 0 ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsInCombat == 1 && cTimer < 300 Set cTimer to cTimer + GetSecondsPassed EndIf
;;------------MED SCHOOL TRACKING-------------- If DoOnce == 0 If DelilahMREF.MetKemp == 1 && DelilahMREF.MetSchuler == 1 && DelilahMREF.MetStraus == 1 SetObjectiveCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 12 1 Set DoOnce to 1 EndIf EndIf
If DelilahMREF.MetKemp == 0 && DoctorKempREF.GetDead == 1 SetStage 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 21 EndIf
If DelilahMREF.MetStraus == 0 && AdaStrausREF.GetDead == 1 SetStage 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 21 EndIf
If DelilahMREF.MetUsanagi == 0 && DoctorUsanagiREF.GetDead == 1 SetStage 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 21 EndIf
If DelilahMREF.MetSchuler == 0 && LindaSchulerREF.GetDead == 1 SetStage 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 21 EndIf
If DelilahMREF.MetFarkas == 0 && VFSJulieFarkasREF.GetDead == 1 SetStage 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 21 EndIf
If (GetObjectiveDisplayed 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 4 == 1) && (GetObjectiveDisplayed 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 12 == 0) SetObjectiveDisplayed 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 5 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 10 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 12 1 EndIf
;;----------POSSIBLY USELESS BOOK VARIABLES---------------- If PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahFALBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 ElseIf PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DahliaParadiseLost == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 Elseif PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahBook2 == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 Elseif PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahEnderBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 Elseif PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahFlowersBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 Elseif PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahGrapesBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 Elseif PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahGraysBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 Elseif PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahOTRBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 Elseif PlayerREF.GetItemCount 00DelilahTalesBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 Elseif PlayerRef.GetItemCount VBSPediatricsBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 ElseIf PlayerRef.GetItemCount VBSPsychologyBook == 1 Set PlayerHasBook to 1 EndIf
END

SCN 00DelilahFarkasTrainScript
short DoOnce ;Script blocker
float Timer ;Timer used for animation control
BEGIN GameMode
if ( DoOnce== 0 ) set Timer to 6 set DoOnce to 1 endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 5 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
; if ( Timer <= 3) && ( DoOnce == 2 ) ; set DelilahMREF.Delay to 1 ; endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) EnablePlayerControls ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgMetFarkas set DoOnce to 0 ; set DelilahMREF.Delay to 0 DelilahMREF.ResetAI VFSJulieFarkasREF.ResetAI DelilahMREF.SayTo VFSJulieFarkasREF 00VDFarkas 1 StopQuest DelilahFarkasTimerQuest endif
endif
END

scn 00DelilahSCRIPT
Short HasBeenHired Short L38 Short Relax Short DoOnce Short ANovac Short Fort Short Attitude Short bFLDelilahActive Short LoadedOnce short STFU short delilahchats
;;-----Book Variables----- Short PlayerHasBook1 Short DelilahHasBook Short CanTeachMarkland
;;-----Follow Packages----- int CombatStyleRanged int CombatStyleMelee int IsFollowingDefault int IsFollowingLong int IsFollowingClose int FollowerSwitchAggressive int Waiting int FallBack
;;-----Meet----- int PlayerKnowsDelilah int PlayerKnowsDelilahStory
;;-----Medical----- int MetUsanagi int MetSchuler int MetFarkas int MetKemp int MetStraus int PlayerTrain
;;-----Random----- int LeftAngry int ChemTalk int JoinedFollowers int HiredAgain int Delay int ccDoOnce int esDoOnce int mmdDoOnce
float vdTimer float Timer
;;------------------------------ BEGIN GAMEMODE
If (DoOnce != 1) Set HasBeenHired to 0 Set L38 to 0 Set CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set IsFollowingClose to 0 Set FallBack to 0 Set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 Set Waiting to 0 Set Relax to 0 Set PlayerKnowsDelilah to 0 Set ANovac to 0 Set Fort to 0 Set PlayerKnowsDelilahStory to 0 Set MetUsanagi to 0 Set MetSchuler to 0 Set MetFarkas to 0 Set MetKemp to 0 Set MetStraus to 0 Set PlayerTrain to 0 Set ChemTalk to 0 Set LeftAngry to 0 Set JoinedFollowers to 0 Set HiredAgain to 0 Set Attitude to 0 Set PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahHasBook to 0 Set bFLDelilahActive to 0 Set STFU to 0 set delilahchats to 0 set Delay to 0 set CanTeachMarkland to 0 set ccDoOnce to 0 set esDoOnce to 0 set mmdDoOnce to 0 set Timer to 0 Set DoOnce to 1 EndIf
If esDoOnce == 0 && HasBeenHired == 1 If ( PlayerREF.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahNiptonQuest == 1 ) If ( PlayerREF.HasPerk EmergencySurgeon == 0 ) ShowMessage FollowerMessagePerkDelilahes PlayerREF.AddPerk EmergencySurgeon Set esDoOnce to 1 EndIf EndIf EndIf
If mmdDoOnce == 0 && HasBeenHired == 1 If ( PlayerREF.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue == 1 ) If ( PlayerREF.HasPerk DelilahMojaveMD == 0 ) ShowMessage DelilahMsgMojaveMD PlayerREF.AddPerk DelilahMojaveMD Set mmdDoOnce to 1 EndIf EndIf EndIf
If ( GetPCEnemyofFaction FollowersOfTheApocalypseFaction == 1 ) && ( LeftAngry == 0 ) set DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired to 0 set DelilahMREF.HiredAgain to 1 set DelilahMREF.LeftAngry to 1 set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude - 100 DelilahMREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade 00DelilahAngryHomeMarkerREF ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgGone playerREF.RemovePerk 00DelilahPerk IF PlayerREF.HasPerk DelilahMojaveMD playerREF.RemovePerk DelilahMojaveMD showmessage DelilahMsgLostMD EndIf If PlayerREF.HasPerk EmergencySurgeon PlayerREF.RemovePerk EmergencySurgeon ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgLostES EndIf IF PlayerREF.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue == 0 SetStage 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 21 StopQuest 00DelilahMedicalDialogue EndIF
IF PlayerREF.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahLabCoat == 0 SetStage 00DelilahLabCoat 8 StopQuest 00DelilahLabCoat EndIf
IF PlayerREF.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahNiptonQuest == 0 SetStage 00DelilahNiptonQuest 11 StopQuest 00DelilahNiptonQuest EndIF
If PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahAntivenomCombat StopQuest DelilahAntivenomCombat EndIf
If PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning Delilah1BookRead StopQuest Delilah1BookRead
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingEnderQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingEnderQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahBooks StopQuest DelilahBooks
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingFALQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingFALQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingFlowersQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingFlowersQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingGrapesQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingGrapesQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingOTRQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingOTRQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingGraysQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingGraysQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingTalesQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingTalesQuest
EndIf EndIf EndIf
;;If Attitude >= 15 ; StartQuest 00DelilahRomanceQuest ; SetStage 00DelilahRomanceQuest 5 ;;EndIf
END
BEGIN OnLoad
; set up base stats if (LoadedOnce == 0) SetActorValue sneak 100; set LoadedOnce to 1; evp endif
;Script to make sure we set the right combat style on loading. If (CombatStyleMelee == 1) DelilahMREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee; Else DelilahMREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged; EndIf
END
BEGIN GameMode
If STFU == 0 If (DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault || DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong) && DelilahMREF.GetDistance Player >= 200 If DelilahChats == 0 && DelilahMREF.IsSneaking == 0 && DelilahMREF.Waiting == 0 && DelilahMREF.IsTalking == 0 If IsPlayerInRegion VMapGoodspringsRegion DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDDelilahAtGoodsprings Set DelilahChats to 1 ElseIf Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideFortWorld DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDDelilahAtFort Set DelilahChats to 1 ElseIf Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideWorld || Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideNorthWorld DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDDelilahAtFreeside Set DelilahChats to 1 EndIf EndIf EndIf EndIf
;;;Timer to reset chats variable to get her to talk again
If DelilahChats == 1 If Timer < 600 Set Timer to Timer + GetSecondsPassed Else Set DelilahChats to 0 Set Timer to 0 endif endif
if (DelilahMREF.GetPlayerTeammate == 1 && HasBeenHired == 1) If Player.GetHealthPercentage < 0.5 && Player.HasPerk FerociousLoyalty == 1 if DelilahMREF.GetPlayerTeammate == 1 && bFLDelilahActive == 0 DelilahMREF.AddSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set bFLDelilahActive to 1 EndIf EndIf EndIf If Player.GetHealthPercentage >= 0.5 && Player.HasPerk FerociousLoyalty == 1 if DelilahMREF.GetPlayerTeammate == 1 && bFLDelilahActive == 1 DelilahMREF.RemoveSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set bFLDelilahActive to 0 EndIf EndIf if (DelilahMREF.IsInCombat == 0 && DelilahMREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive == 1 && DelilahMREF.Waiting ==0) if (player.IsWeaponOut == 1) DelilahMREF.setalert 1 endif if (player.IsWeaponOut == 0) DelilahMREF.setalert 0 endif endif END
BEGIN OnStartCombat
Set vdTimer to vdTimer - GetSecondsPassed
;;----------First Aid----------
StartQuest DelilahAntivenomCombat Set DelilahAntivenomCombat.Timer to 0 Set DelilahAntivenomCombat.PoisonTreated to 0
; If (DelilahMREF.IsInCombat) && (vdTimer >= 15) ; If (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak >= 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak >= 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetAV Health <= 0.50) ; DelilahMREF.CIOS Stimpak ; DelilahMREF.RemoveItem Stimpak 1 ; DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDFirstAid ; Set VDTimer to 0 ; ; ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak >= 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak == 0) && (DelilahMREF.GetAV Health <= 0.50) ; DelilahMREF.CIOS Stimpak ; DelilahMREF.RemoveItem Stimpak 1 ; DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDFirstAid ; Set vdTimer to 0 ; ; ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak == 0) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak == 0) && (DelilahMREF.GetActorValue Health <= 0.50) ; DelilahMREF.CIOS NVSuperStimpak ; DelilahMREF.RemoveItem NVSuperStimpak 1 ; DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDFirstAid ; Set vdTimer to 0 ; ; ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak == 0) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak ==0) && (DelilahMREF.GetActorValue Health <= 0.50) ; ;DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDGotAStim ; Set vdTimer to 0 ; ; EndIf ; EndIf ; ; Set vdTimer to vdTimer - GetSecondsPassed
END
;;----------Crit Response----------
BEGIN OnHit
If (DelilahMREF.IsInCombat) If (DelilahMREF.GetLastHitCritical == 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak >= 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak >= 1) DelilahMREF.CIOS Stimpak DelilahMREF.RemoveItem Stimpak 1 DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDCritResponse Set vdTimer to 0
ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetLastHitCritical == 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak >= 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak == 0) DelilahMREF.CIOS Stimpak DelilahMREF.RemoveItem Stimpak 1 DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDCritResponse Set vdTimer to 0
ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetLastHitCritical == 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak == 0) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak >= 1) DelilahMREF.CIOS NVSuperStimpak DelilahMREF.RemoveItem NVSuperStimpak 1 DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDCritResponse Set vdTimer to 0
ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetLastHitCritical == 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Stimpak == 0) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVSuperStimpak == 0) ;DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDGotAStim Set vdTimer to 0
EndIf EndIf END
BEGIN OnCombatEND
if ( GetPlayerTeammate == 1 ) resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
Set vdTimer to 0
END
BEGIN OnDeath
set DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired to 0 ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgDead playerREF.RemovePerk 00DelilahPerk IF PlayerREF.HasPerk DelilahMojaveMD playerREF.RemovePerk DelilahMojaveMD showmessage DelilahMsgLostMD EndIf If PlayerREF.HasPerk EmergencySurgeon PlayerREF.RemovePerk EmergencySurgeon ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgLostES EndIf endif
IF PlayerREF.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue == 0 SetStage 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 21 StopQuest 00DelilahMedicalDialogue EndIF
IF PlayerREF.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahLabCoat == 0 SetStage 00DelilahLabCoat 8 StopQuest 00DelilahLabCoat EndIf
IF PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning 00DelilahNiptonQuest == 0 SetStage 00DelilahNiptonQuest 11 StopQuest 00DelilahNiptonQuest EndIF
If PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahAntivenomCombat StopQuest DelilahAntivenomCombat EndIf
If PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning Delilah1BookRead StopQuest Delilah1BookRead
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingEnderQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingEnderQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahBooks StopQuest DelilahBooks
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingFALQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingFALQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingFlowersQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingFlowersQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingGrapesQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingGrapesQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingOTRQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingOTRQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingGraysQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingGraysQuest
ElseIf PlayerREF.GetQuestRunning DelilahReadingTalesQuest StopQuest DelilahReadingTalesQuest
EndIf
END

scn VMS30HealTimer1SCRIPT
float fTimer short bRunTimer short nEvent short iOutcome
begin GameMode
; Timer for Fadeout
if (bRunTimer) if (fTimer > 0) set fTimer to fTimer - GetSecondsPassed else if (nEvent == 0) ;Fade Out set nEvent to nEvent + 1 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX set fTimer to 2.0 DisablePlayerControls elseif (nEvent == 1) ;Run this on Faded Out Set GameHour to Gamehour + 1 set nEvent to nEvent + 1 set fTimer to 3.0
;Run My Quest Stuff HERE CFHInjuredTrooper01.UnequipItem ArmorNVNCRTrooper 0 1 CFHInjuredTrooper01.RemoveItem ArmorNVNCRTrooper 1 1
elseif (nEvent == 2) ;Run this on Faded In set nEvent to nEvent + 1 set bRunTimer to 0

scn VMS30HealTimer2SCRIPT
float fTimer short bRunTimer short nEvent short iOutcome
begin GameMode
; Timer for Fadeout
if (bRunTimer) if (fTimer > 0) set fTimer to fTimer - GetSecondsPassed else if (nEvent == 0) ;Fade Out set nEvent to nEvent + 1 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX set fTimer to 2.0 DisablePlayerControls elseif (nEvent == 1) ;Run this on Faded Out Set GameHour to Gamehour + 1 set nEvent to nEvent + 1 set fTimer to 3.0
;Run My Quest Stuff HERE CFHInjuredTrooper02.UnequipItem ArmorNVNCRTrooper 0 1 CFHInjuredTrooper02.RemoveItem ArmorNVNCRTrooper 1 1 if (iOutcome == 1) ;Both Legs = 1 CFHInjuredTrooper02.AddItem ArmorNVNCRDeadTrooper01 1 CFHInjuredTrooper02.EquipItem ArmorNVNCRDeadTrooper01 1 1 ;Leg&Hand = 4 elseif (iOutcome == 4) || (iOutcome == 5) ;Leg&Hand = 4 CFHInjuredTrooper02.AddItem ArmorNVNCRDeadTrooper04 1 CFHInjuredTrooper02.EquipItem ArmorNVNCRDeadTrooper04 1 1 elseif (iOutcome == 7) CFHInjuredTrooper02.AddItem ArmorNVNCRDeadTrooper04 1 CFHInjuredTrooper02.EquipItem ArmorNVNCRDeadTrooper04 1 endif
elseif (nEvent == 2) ;Run this on Faded In set nEvent to nEvent + 1 set bRunTimer to 0
if iOutcome == 1 AddReputation RepNVNCR 0 1 set VMS30.iRichardsFindPlayer to 2 ShowMessage VMS30InjuredTrooper02KillMsg CFHInjuredTrooper02.kill set CFHInjuredTrooper02.TrooperHealed to 1 set VMS30.iBattlefieldMedicKilled to 1 CFHRichardsRef.evp ;setStage VMS30 110 elseif iOutcome == 2 set VMS30.iRichardsFindPlayer to 1 ShowMessage VMS30InjuredTrooperLowSkillMsg2 set CFHInjuredTrooper02.Injured to 1 set CFHInjuredTrooper02.TrooperHealed to 1 set VMS30.iBattlefieldMedicWorsened to VMS30.iBattlefieldMedicWorsened +1 set VMS30.iBattlefieldMedic to VMS30.iBattlefieldMedic + 1 CFHRichardsRef.evp ;setStage VMS30 115 elseif iOutcome == 3 ShowMessage VMS30InjuredTrooperNeutralMsg ;setStage VMS30 115 elseif iOutcome == 4 ShowMessage VMS30InjuredTrooper02HealMsg set CFHInjuredTrooper02.TrooperHealed to 1 set VMS30.iBattlefieldMedic to VMS30.iBattlefieldMedic + 1 rewardXP 80 ;setStage VMS30 120 elseif iOutcome == 5 ;Remove Items ;Display Message ShowMessage VMS30InjuredTrooper02HealMsgAlt set CFHInjuredTrooper02.TrooperHealed to 1 set VMS30.iBattlefieldMedic to VMS30.iBattlefieldMedic + 1 rewardXP 40 Player.RemoveItem MedicalBrace 1 Player.RemoveItem Morphine 1 Player.RemoveItem SurgicalBonesaw01 1 elseif iOutcome == 6 ShowMessage VMS30InjuredTrooperDelilahNeutralMsg DelilahMREF.EVP elseif iOutcome == 7 ShowMessage VMS30InjuredTrooper02DelilahHealMsg set CFHInjuredTrooper02.TrooperHealed to 1 set VMS30.iBattlefieldMedic to VMS30.iBattlefieldMedic + 1 rewardXP 80 DelilahMREF.EVP endif
EnablePlayerControls StopQuest VMS30HealTimer1 endif endif endif
end ;GameMode

SCN InjuredBoomerSCRIPT
short BoomerHealed short Button short MenuDepth short PlayerMayAttempt short SetPlayerChance short MenuLevel short Injured
BEGIN OnLoad if ( BoomerHealed == 0 && GetDead == 0 ) setRestrained 1 SetUnconscious 1 endif END
begin OnDeath set BoomerHealed to 1 end
begin OnDeath player set NellisArgyllRef.FindPlayer to 4 set VFreeformNellis.iMedicineManKilled to 1 nellisargyllRef.evp addreputation repnvboomer 0 4 end
BEGIN OnActivate
if getdead && NellisArgyllREF.GetDead activate elseif VFreeformNellis.iMedicineManKilled == 0 && (VFreeformNellis.iMedicineManActive || NellisArgyllRef.GetDead) if ( isActionRef player == 1 ) && ( BoomerHealed == 0 ) && ( GetDead == 0 ) if ( player.GetAv Medicine < 40 ) ShowMessage InjuredBoomerLowSkillMsg elseif ( player.GetAv Medicine >= 40 ) set PlayerMayAttempt to 1 ShowMessage InjuredBoomerMsg endif elseif Injured == 1 showMessage InjuredBoomerWorseCondition else activate endif elseif VFreeformNellis.iMedicineManKilled showMessage InjuredBoomerNoOperate else showMessage InjuredBoomerNoOperateYet endif END
BEGIN GameMode if ( BoomerHealed == 0 ) set Button to GetButtonPressed if ( Button == 1 ) if ( PlayerMayAttempt == 0 ) && (player.GetAV Medicine <= 20) set NellisArgyllRef.FindPlayer to 4 ShowMessage InjuredBoomerKillMsg InjuredBoomerREF.kill set VFreeformNellis.iMedicineManKilled to 1 ;NellisArgyllRef.StartConversation Player NellisArgyllPatientKilled nellisargyllRef.evp addreputation repnvboomer 0 4 set BoomerHealed to 1 elseif ( PlayerMayAttempt == 0 ) && (player.GetAV Medicine <= 30) set NellisArgyllRef.FindPlayer to 1 ShowMessage InjuredBoomerLowSkillMsg2 set Injured to 1 set VFreeformNellis.iMedicineManWorsened to VFreeformNellis.iMedicineManWorsened +1 set VFreeformNellis.iMedicineMan to VFreeformNellis.iMedicineMan + 1 ;NellisArgyllRef.StartConversation Player NellisArgyllPatientHarmed nellisargyllRef.evp addreputation repNVBoomer 0 2 set BoomerHealed to 1 elseif ( PlayerMayAttempt == 0 ) && (player.GetAV Medicine <= 40) ShowMessage InjuredBoomerNeutralMsg else ;set NellisArgyllRef.FindPlayer to 2 ShowMessage InjuredBoomerHealMsg set VFreeformNellis.iMedicineMan to VFreeformNellis.iMedicineMan + 1 ;NellisArgyllRef.StartConversation NellisArgyllRef NellisArgyllPatientHealed NellisArgyllRef.say NellisArgyllPatientHealed 1 rewardXP 40 ;nellisargyllRef.evp addreputation repNVBoomer 1 4 set BoomerHealed to 1 endif elseif (Button == 2) DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahHealNellis1 if (DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetAV Medicine <= 40) showmessage vms30injuredtrooperdelilahneutralmsg delilahmref.evp elseif (DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired == 1) && (DelilahMREF.GetAV Medicine > 40) showmessage injuredboomerdelilahhealmsg set VFreeformNellis.iMedicineMan to VFreeformNellis.iMedicineMan + 1 NellisArgyllRef.say NellisArgyllPatientHealed 1 rewardXP 40 addreputation repNVBoomer 1 4 set BoomerHealed to 1 DelilahMREF.evp endif endif endif
END

endif endif endif

scn 00DelilahIdleChatterScript
short DelilahChats short DoOnce short ccDoOnce
float Timer
Begin GameMode
If DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired == 0 Return ElseIf DelilahMREF.STFU Return ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsInCombat Return ElseIf (DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault || DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong || DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose) && DelilahMREF.GetDistance Player >= 200 If DelilahChats == 0 && DelilahMREF.IsSneaking == 0 && DelilahMREF.Waiting == 0 && DelilahMREF.IsTalking == 0 If IsPlayerInRegion VMapGoodspringsRegion DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDDelilahAtGoodsprings Set DelilahChats to 1 ElseIf Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideFortWorld DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDDelilahAtFort Set DelilahChats to 1 ElseIf Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideWorld || Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideNorthWorld DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDDelilahAtFreeside Set DelilahChats to 1 Else DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDTimedChatter 1 Set DelilahChats to 1 EndIf EndIf EndIf
If (ccDoOnce == 0) && NVBlakeREF.GetDistance Player <= 150 ;&& PlayerREF.GetInSameCell VBSPsychologyBookREF == 1 DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahccBookStuff ;DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDMedicalTexts 1 set ccDoOnce to 1 DelilahMREF.ResetAI EndIf
;;;Timer to reset chats variable to get her to talk again
If DelilahChats == 1 If Timer < 400 Set Timer to Timer + GetSecondsPassed Else Set DelilahChats to 0 Set Timer to 0 endif endif
END

Scn 00Delilah2Script
float Timer
short PoisonTreated short DoOnce
Begin GameMode
;;;Gives Delilah one dose of Antivenom if she is poisoned
If PoisonTreated == 0 && DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVAntivenom >= 1 If DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget PoisonGreaseRadscorpionSpell DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
ElseIf DelilahMREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison DelilahMREF.CIOS NVAntivenom ShowMessage FollowerMessageDelilahAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 1
endif endif
;;;Timer to reset variable so she can treat herself again after 30 seconds if she is re-poisoned
If PoisonTreated == 1 If Timer < 30 Set Timer to Timer + GetSecondsPassed Else Set PoisonTreated to 0 Set Timer to 0 endif endif
END

scn 00DelilahTimerQuestScript
short DoOnce ;Script blocker
float Timer ;Timer used for animation control
BEGIN GameMode
if ( DoOnce== 0 ) set Timer to 6 set DoOnce to 1 endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 5 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 3) && ( DoOnce == 2 ) set DelilahMREF.Delay to 1 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) EnablePlayerControls set DoOnce to 0 set DelilahMREF.Delay to 0 DelilahMREF.ResetAI StopQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest endif
endif
END

scn 00DelilahMedicalScript
short menu short button short NoSignal short PlayerHealed short Health short MaxHealth short BloodPacks short PBloodPacks short Fixer float bTimer
BEGIN OnEquip Player set NoSignal to 0 set PlayerHealed to 0 set menu to 1 player.unequipitem 00DelilahMedKit END
BEGIN OnDrop Player DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahMedKit 1 disable END
BEGIN GameMode
if (DelilahMREF.GetUnconscious == 0) && (DelilahMREF.GetDead == 0)
if (Menu == 1) set Health to PlayerREF.GetAV Health set MaxHealth to PlayerREF.GetPermAV Health showmessage DelilahMedicalMenu Health MaxHealth set bTimer to bTimer + GetSecondsPassed set Menu to 2 EndIf
If (Menu == 2) && (PlayerHealed == 0) set button to GetButtonPressed ; if button == 0; crippled ; If (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Morphine == 0) && (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount Wonderglue == 0) ; If (DelilahMREF.GetAV PerceptionCondition < 100) ; DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDHead ; Set Menu to 5 ; ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetAV EnduranceCondition < 100) ; DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDChest ; SetMenu to 5 ; ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetAV RightAttackCondition < 100) ;DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDArms ; Set Menu to 5 ; ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetAV LeftAttackCondition < 100) ; ;DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDArms ; Set Menu to 5 ; ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetAV LeftMobilityCondition < 100) ; ;DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDLegs ; Set Menu to 5 ; ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetAV RightMobilityCondition < 100) ; ;DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDLegs ; Set Menu to 5 ; EndIf ; EndIf ;EndIf
; If DelilahMREF.GetItemCount ; DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical ; StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest ; DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDBookChatter 1 1 ; PlayerREF.RestoreAV PerceptionCondition 100 ; PlayerREF.RestoreAV RightAttackCondition 100 ; PlayerREF.RestoreAV RightMobilityCondition 100 ; PlayerREF.RestoreAV LeftAttackCondition 100 ; PlayerREF.RestoreAV LeftMobilityCondition 100 ; PlayerREF.RestoreAV EnduranceCondition 100 ; Set PlayerHealed to 1 ; ResetAI ; DelilahMREF.EVP ; set Menu to 0 ;; EndIf If button == 0; injured If (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount BloodPack == 0) DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDNeedBlood return ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount BloodPack >= 1) DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical DelilahMREF.RemoveItem BloodPack 1 PlaySound NPCHumanUsingRadaway 1 DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDHeal 1 1 SetStage VDoctors 10 Set PlayerHealed to 1 ; ResetAI DelilahMREF.evp set Menu to 0 EndIf EndIf If button == 1; addicted If (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVFixer >= 1) DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDFixer StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest SetStage VDoctors 20 Set PlayerHealed to 1 DelilahMREF.evp Set Menu to 0 ElseIf (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVFixer == 0) DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDFixerB Set Menu to 4 EndIf EndIf If button == 2; poison DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDBookChatter PlayerREF.CIOS NVAntivenom Set PlayerHealed to 1 ; ResetAI DelilahMREF.evp set Menu to 0 EndIf If button == 3; radiation DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDBookChatter StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest SetStage VDoctors 30 Set PlayerHealed to 1 ; ResetAI DelilahMREF.evp set Menu to 0 EndIf If button == 4; cancel DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00DahliaLetsTalkAboutSomethingElse set Menu to 0 EndIf EndIf
If (Menu == 3) && (PlayerHealed == 0) set BloodPacks to DelilahMREF.GetItemCount BloodPack set PBloodPacks to PlayerREF.GetItemCount BloodPack ShowMessage DelilahMedicalMenuBlood BloodPacks PBloodPacks Set Button to GetButtonPressed If (Button == 0) PlayerREF.RemoveItem BloodPack 1 DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical PlaySound NPCHumanUsingRadaway 1 DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDHeal SetStage VDoctors 10 Set PlayerHealed to 1 ; ResetAI DelilahMREF.evp set Menu to 0 EndIf If (Button == 1) Set Menu to 0 EndIf EndIf
If (Menu == 4) && (PlayerHealed == 0) Set Button to GetButtonPressed Set Fixer to (DelilahMREF.GetItemCount NVFixer) ShowMessage DelilahMedicalMenuAddiction Fixer If (button == 0) PlayerREF.RemoveItem NVFixer 1 DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDFixer StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest SetStage vDoctors 20 Set PlayerHealed to 1 DelilahMREF.evp Set Menu to 0 EndIf If (button == 1) DelilahMREF.SayTo DelilahMREF 00VDFixerA set Menu to 0 EndIf EndIf
If bTimer > 15 && (Menu == 0) ;ResetAI ;DelilahMREF.RemoveScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical 1 Set PlayerHealed to 0 Set bTimer to 0 DelilahMREF.Evp EndIf EndIf
END

scn 00LadyFollowScript
short HasBeenHired short CombatStyleRanged short CombatStyleMelee short IsFollowingDefault short Fired short L38 short Fort short ANovac short DoOnce short SpotAssassin short Stay short iHealed
int Rage
BEGIN OnCombatEND
resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 set Rage to 0
END
Begin OnDeath
If HasBeenHired == 1 Set HasBeenHired to 0 ShowMessage LadyDeadMsg endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
If DoOnce != 1 Set HasBeenHired to 0 Set CombatStyleRanged to 0 Set CombatStyleMelee to 1 Set IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set Fired to 0 Set ANovac to 0 Set Fort to 0 Set L38 to 0 damageav leftmobilitycondition 100 Set DoOnce to 1 EndIf
If ( DelilahMREF.GetDead == 0 ) && ( LadyMREF.GetDead == 0) && ( LadyMREF.GetUnconscious == 0 ) If ( DelilahMREF.IsInCombat == 1 ) && DelilahMREF.GetHealthPercentage < 0.50 If ( Rage == 0 ) && ( IsFollowingDefault == 1 ) Set Rage to 1 EndIf If ( Rage == 1 ) LadyMREF.AddSpell 00SnufflesBuff ShowMessage 00SnufflesFrenzyMsg Set Rage to 2 EndIf EndIf EndIF
if GetQuestRunning VMQ03a if (GetDistance VHDLegionAssassinBomberREF < 192) && (SpotAssassin == 0) set SpotAssassin to 1 ;sayto VHDLegionAssassinBomberREF Hello 1 set VMQ03a.iDogFoundSpy to 1 Look VHDLegionAssassinBomberREF playIdle LooseDogBarkSingleHighPriority elseif (GetDistance VHDLegionSniperREF < 192) && (SpotAssassin == 0) set SpotAssassin to 1 Look VHDLegionSniperREF playIdle LooseDogBarkSingleHighPriority endif endif
END

ESP.ORIGINAL: Followers of the Apocalypse Field Assignment

Followers of the Apocalypse Indigenous Liason Department To: Dr. Julie Farkas, Acting Administrator; Old Mormon Fort
## Internal Document -- DO NOT DISCARD OR DISCLOSE##
Our Field Agent #76, Joshua Tremble, has gone missing. Agent Tremble was on assignment in Nipton during the Legion attack. He has not been heard from since. This tragedy is made more horrible by the fact that Agent Tremble had in his posession a Holodisk containing the passcodes to many essential FoA terminals throughout the Mojave. If these passcodes fall into the wrong hands, we could have a catastrophic security breach on our hands. Anyone could gain access to our supply line routes, computer networks, and data stores with these passcodes. They must be found and destroyed before this happens.
## END Internal Document -- DO NOT DISCARD OR DISCLOSE##
ESP.TRADUIT:
Departamento de Relaciones Indígenas - Seguidores del Apocalipsis Para: Doctora Julie Farkas, administradora
## Documento Interno -- NO DESCARTAR NI DVIULGAR##
Nuestro agente de campo #76, Joshua Tremble, ha desaparecido. El agente Tremble estaba de misión en Nipton durante el ataque de la Legión. No sabemos nada de él desde entonces. Esta tragedia

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neatly Folded Note

Goodbye cruel world. Ha. No, seriously.
I just couldn't do it..
They came and started burning, and killing.. the screaming. The screaming hasn't stopped. Oh God, but I still just couldn't do it. The Boneyard said to release those.. the test subjects. I can't. I won't. They'll be here soon. They're in the Town Hall now I think. I'm just gonna give myself a shot and sleep. They'll be here soon.. They'll be in for a surprise. I'll just open the gate.. won't they be in for a surprise. I'm sorry. -Jeremy

GREETING
I've gotta hand it to you. You've done good things for Novac, but you've also got 'em a little scared of you. And that's great for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: Lo reconozco, has hecho grandes cosas por Novac, pero también has asustado a muchos. Y eso es estupendo para el negocio.

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as you keep it coming, I'll get you some things a little cheaper than they should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: Mientras sigas así, te mantendré el descuento en parte de la mercancía.

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you?
Alright, that should do it. You need anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: Muy bien; con esto bastará. ¿Qué más necesitas?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setav variable01 0
And we're all done. That wasn't so bad, was it? Did you need anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: Bueno, pues esto ya está. Al final no ha sido para tanto, ¿verdad? ¿Necesitas algo más?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setav variable01 0
Hello, wanderer. Please forgive us of our humble surroundings. Our true home awaits us in the Far Beyond.
ESP.TRADUIT: Hola, trotamundos. Perdona este entorno tan humilde. Nuestro verdadero hogar nos espera en el más allá.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ghoul voice; welcoming
Have you come to help us complete the Great Journey?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Has venido a ayudarnos a completar el Gran Viaje?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ghoul voice; hopeful
I waited to speak with you one last time before I descended to the launch pad, wanderer.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quería hablar contigo una última vez antes de bajar a la plataforma de lanzamiento, trotamundos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ghoul voice; greeting
I want you to know that we will remember for all eternity how you delivered us to the threshold of the Great Journey.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero que sepas que siempre recordaremos cómo nos llevaste hasta las puertas del Gran Viaje.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ghoul voice; sincerely
Our preparations are nearly complete, but the rockets that will carry us to salvation are yet missing vital components.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ya casi hemos acabado nuestros preparativos, pero en los cohetes que nos llevarán a la salvación aún faltan ciertos componentes vitales.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ghoul voice
If you would still help us, wanderer, speak to Chris. He can tell you what is missing.
ESP.TRADUIT: Si aún quieres ayudarnos, trotamundos, habla con Chris. Él te dirá qué es lo que falta.

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no way that we can thank you enough, wanderer. Your arrival here was a blessing. We will remember you always.
ESP.TRADUIT: No tenemos forma de agradecértelo lo suficiente, trotamundos. Tu llegada ha sido una bendición. Nunca te olvidaremos.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SetObjectiveCompleted VMS01 21 1 SetStage VMS01 40
; Make Jason walk to the hatch Set VMS01.JasonGoodbye to 1 JasonBright.evp
; Make Chris appear and begin fixing things ChrisHaversamREF.enable ChrisHaversamREF.evp
{Grateful}Thanks for handling the Fiends. One less pack of dogs to hurt the troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Agradecido}Gracias por ocuparte de los Maníacos. Una manada menos de perros para dañar a las tropas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remarkable work saving Kimball. Glad you were around to prevent his assassination.
ESP.TRADUIT: Es impresionante cómo salvaste a Kimball. Me alegro de que estuvieras por allí para evitar que lo asesinaran.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Irritated}Yeah?
Howdy.
Do you require medical attention?
If you're looking for a quick stitch, I'm your man.
ESP.TRADUIT: Si necesitas un par de puntos rápidos, soy tu hombre.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard through the locals that Nephi has passed on. I truly hope his soul finds peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: He escuchado decir a la gente que Nephi ha fallecido. Ojalá que su alma descanse en paz.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome, brother! How can I help you?
Welcome, sister! How can I help you?
Is there something else I can do for you?
You seen Dixon around? He said he'd be back today.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Has visto a Dixon por aquí? Dijo que volvería hoy.

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted VFSHighTimes 5 1
SetObjectiveDisplayed VFSHighTimes 10 1
Have you found the Holotape yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: Bienvenido a Novac. Este sitio no es muy emocionante, pero la gente es bastante agradable.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, man. I'm dying here.
ESP.TRADUIT: Venga, tío. Estoy que me muero.

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted VFSHighTimes 5 1
SetObjectiveDisplayed VFSHighTimes 10 1
Emily says you're working with her on bugging the Lucky 38. That information would be invaluable to our research if you can get it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: Emily dice que estás trabajando con ella en lo de plantar un micro en el Lucky 38. Esa información sería valiosísima para nuestra investigación.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I heard about the bug getting destroyed in the Lucky 38. We'll get in there eventually. It's just a matter of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: Oye, me han dicho que el micro del Lucky 38 ha sido destruido. Terminaremos entrando. Es cuestión de tiempo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of my aides said you got into the Lucky 38. If you see someone by the name of Emily near there, we would like you to work for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: Uno de mis ayudantes me dijo que conseguiste entrar en el Lucky 38. Si ves a una tal Emily por allí, nos gustaría que trabajaras para nosotros.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Concerned}I've heard a few patients mention the Securitrons are acting strangely and no one has heard from Mr. House in a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Preocupada}Algunos pacientes han mencionado que los securitrones se están comportando de manera extraña y que hace tiempo que nadie sabe nada del Sr. House.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If House is out of the picture, maybe we'll be able to get our hands on some of his technology. It would help our scientists greatly.
ESP.TRADUIT: Si House ha desaparecido del mapa, a lo mejor podemos hacernos con algo de su tecnología. Sería de gran ayuda para nuestros científicos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the great {Kai-zar}Caesar is dead. Happy news, but I don't know that it'll make things safer. The rest of his goons may be even worse once they take power.
ESP.TRADUIT: Conque el gran {kái-sar}César ha muerto. Gran noticia, aunque no sé si estaremos más seguros. Quien lo sustituya al mando puede resultar peor que él incluso.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smoke rising from the east spells trouble. I hope the Legion isn't on the move.
ESP.TRADUIT: El humo que se ve al este puede significar problemas. Espero que la legión no se haya puesto en marcha.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sincerely hope the NCR are getting supplies in place to defend against an attack, because it looks like the Legion has plans for the dam again.
ESP.TRADUIT: Espero que la RNC esté preparando suministros para defenderse de un ataque, porque parece que la legión vuelve a tener planes para la presa.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If things don't go well at the dam, all of our efforts here could be for nothing. I hope to God the Legion doesn't win control.
ESP.TRADUIT: Si las cosas no van bien en la presa, todos nuestros esfuerzos aquí podrían haber sido en balde. Pido a Dios que la legión no se haga con el control.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Unknown}Is there something you need?
{Unknown}Hi, do you need assistance?
{Unknown}Can I help you?
{Mixed}Yes?
{Mixed}Do you need something?
{Mixed}Have you ever considered getting your head checked?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Mezcla}¿Alguna vez te has planteado hacerte revisar la cabeza?

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Wild Child}I'm pretty busy, is there something you need?
{Wild Child}Make it quick, I'm a busy woman.
{Wild Child}We don't specialize in psychiatry in this camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Infancia salvaje}En este campamento la psiquiatría no es nuestra especialidad.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Good Natured Rascal}Hey, good to see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Granuja con buen corazón}Eh, me alegro de verte.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Good Natured Rascal}Welcome.
{Liked}Welcome back, friend.
{Liked}Great to see you again.
{Merciful Thug}What do you want?
{Merciful Thug}Watch yourself around here. We don't tolerate thugs in the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Matón compasivo}Ten cuidado por aquí. No toleramos matones en el campamento.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Merciful Thug}I'm busy, make it quick.
{Hated}I hope you don't think I'm going to stitch your sorry ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Odiado}Espero que no pienses que voy a curar tu lastimero culo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hated}Great, you again?
{Hated}Don't you have some kittens to drown or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Odiado}¿No tienes gatitos que ahogar ni nada del estilo?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume this is about something important? You're interrupting my research.
ESP.TRADUIT: Supongo que es por algo importante. Estás interrumpiendo mi investigación.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {somewhat irritated and impatient}Again you interrupt me. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Algo irritado e impaciente}Me has vuelto a interrumpir. ¿Por qué?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there something else I can do for you?
Welcome to the New Vegas Medical Clinic. I'm a fully qualified physician and can fix whatever is wrong with you for a reasonable fee.
ESP.TRADUIT: Te doy la bienvenida a la clínica médica de New Vegas. Soy médico titulada y por una cantidad razonable puedo curarte cualquier dolencia.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've got the caps, I've also got several implants available to enhance your physical attributes.
ESP.TRADUIT: Si tienes chapas, también dispongo de varios implantes que pueden mejorar tus cualidades físicas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. Do you need medical attention?

short nPlayerEndurance
set nPlayerEndurance to (player.GetBaseActorValue Endurance)
if (vDialogueMedicalClinic.nImplantsInstalled) == (nPlayerEndurance) set vDialogueMedicalClinic.bImplantLimitReached to 1 else set vDialogueMedicalClinic.bImplantLimitReached to 0 endif
I'm just security, not a doctor.
ESP.TRADUIT: Yo no soy más que un miembro de la seguridad, no un médico.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, welcome to the New Vegas Medical Clinic. Can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: Bienvenido a Novac. Este sitio no es muy emocionante, pero la gente es bastante agradable.

ESP.ORIGINAL: < sniff, sniff >
< whimper >
set vFreeformSloan.MetSnuffles to 1
< whimper >
< bark >
< bark >
< growl >
Hey! What are you doing here?
Hey. You need something?
Hey. You need something?
You know, you remind me of a young Ernest Hemingway sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sabes, a veces me recuerdas a una versión joven de Ernest Hemingway.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you found me. I think we should talk about what happened.
Just leave me alone.
What's up?
Ah, the office. I love the smell of this place. Antiseptics and bleach, mmm.
I'm a little busy right now.
I wasn't planning to stay here forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: No pensaba quedarme aquí para siempre.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure you're really looking out for the best interests of New Vegas.
PLAYER THROW GRENADE
Ohh shit! Grenade!
PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
Hey! Watch out!
PLAYER IN IRON SITES
Umm, really? Just put the gun down. Nice and easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: Emm... ¿en serio? Venga, baja el arma. Despacio.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Idle Chatter
Sulik used to say that we all have two wolves battling inside of us; a good wolf and an evil wolf. The one that wins is the one we feed.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sulik solía decir que todos tenemos a dos lobos luchando dentro de nosotros; un lobo bueno y un lobo malo. El que gana es al que alimentamos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me know if you see any Broc Flowers blooming. I can use them.
ESP.TRADUIT: Avísame si ves flores de broquia por ahí, puedo aprovecharlas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was a kid, Dad told me the legend of Deadeye Cedrick. Cedrick had lost both eyes, but could hit a bottlecap in midair with his Hunting Rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: Cuando era pequeña, papá me contó la leyenda de Deadeye Cedrick. Cedrick perdió los dos ojos, pero seguía pudiendo disparar a una chapa en el aire con su rifle de caza.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful in the shade. Scorpions like to hide out in the dark during the hottest parts of the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ten cuidado en las sombras. A los escorpiones les gusta esconderse en sitios oscuros durante las partes más calurosas del día.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish we could find somewhere to go swimming.
Keep your eyes peeled for Xander Root. Ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: Avísame si encuentras raíz de xandria, ¿vale?

ESP.ORIGINAL: We might be able to find some Nevada Agave around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: Puede que encontremos algo de agave de Nevada por aquí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Traveling with you has been some of the best medical experience I could ask for. You're a bullet magnet.
ESP.TRADUIT: Viajar contigo ha sido la mejor experiencia médica que podría pedir. Eres un imán para las balas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard there are RadScorpions that can get as a big as a trailer. {Shudder} Eww. That gives me the creeps just thinking of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: He oído que hay mutascorpios del tamaño de un camión {se estremece} Ughh. Solo pensarlo me da escalofríos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't think there are any Radscorpions in here do you?
{sarcastic}Some of the older Fiends would make great research cases. I think they've managed to preserve their organs with all the chemicals they've ingested.
Next time we stop I should organize our medical supplies.
clear throat
yawn, mildly (not a huge long yawn like I'm really tired, just a quick bored yawn)
ESP.TRADUIT: yawn, mildly (not a huge long yawn like I'm really tired, just a quick bored yawn)

ESP.ORIGINAL: belch
SpeechChallengeFailure
I'm hurt. I need help, Doc.
Don't think because I'm a Ghoul, I'm stupid. You're fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: Soy necrófago, pero no idiota. A ti no te pasa nada.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this a trick question? I don't even see a scratch on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: A lo mejor es que tiene truco o algo, pero yo no te veo ni un solo rasguño.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here.
Perfect timing, I was just finishing this chapter.
Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1
C'mon, let's get going.
Great! I'll try to find a good place to read.

Will you wait for me here?
Ok, I'll try to find something to do.
Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 1 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
Will you wait for me here?
Alright, I'm ready.
Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1
C'mon, let's get going.
Let's trade equipment.
{Sure.}
OpenTeammateContainer
Can I see what you're carrying?
{Ok.}
OpenTeammateContainer
Can I see what you're carrying?
{Ok, here you go.}
OpenTeammateContainer
Can I see what you're carrying?
{Of course, you always have the best stuff.}
OpenTeammateContainer
Can I see what you're carrying?
Enough about tactics.
Enough about tactics.
Keep your distance.
Alright.
Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 DelilahMREF.evp
Keep your distance.
Alright, you're good. Let's head out.
ESP.TRADUIT: Vale, eres acojonante. Salgamos de aquí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you're good. Let's head out.
You're good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: Tu distancia es buena. Hablemos de otra cosa.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're good. Let's talk about something else.
Just stay within talking distance.
You got it.
Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 DelilahMREF.evp
Stick close by.
Let's talk about how closely you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: Hablemos de cómo me estás siguiendo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok.
Let's talk about how closely you're following me.
Use a ranged weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: No se te dan mal las armas de largo alcance. Sigue así.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will do.
DelilahMREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged Set DelilahMREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set DelilahMREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0
When the fighting starts, I want you using your gun.
Use a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: Cambia a un arma de combate cuerpo a cuerpo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
DelilahMREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee Set DelilahMREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 Set DelilahMREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1
Use a melee weapon. We're getting up close and personal.
Let's talk about something else.
Sure.
Let's talk about something else.
That's it. Let's head out.
That's it. Let's head out.
I want to talk about your fighting style.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero que cambies tu estilo de combate.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
I want to talk about your fighting style.
ESP.TRADUIT: Hablemos de tu estilo de lucha.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
Ok, what about them?
Let's talk about your tactics.
Let's get going.
Okay.
Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 DelilahMREF.evp
Let's go.
It's about time! I was beginning to think you'd never come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Ya era hora! Empezaba a pensar que nunca volverías.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1
C'mon, let's get going.
It's time for us to part ways.
Are you sure?
It's time for you to go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: Es hora de que te vayas a casa.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like to come with me?
I would love to! I think that this is exactly the opportunity I've been waiting for! Let me grab my things.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Me encantaría! ¡Creo que es justo la oportunidad que necesitaba! Ahora recojo mis cosas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.LeftAngry to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired to 1 Set DelilahMREF.ChemTalk to 0 Set DelilahMREF.L38 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.ANovac to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Fort to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 Set DelilahMREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set DelilahMREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 DelilahMREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 DelilahMREF.SetPlayerTeammate 1 DelilahMREF.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 DelilahMREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 2 DelilahMREF.evp

Would you like to come with me? I could use someone with your medical experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Vendrías conmigo? Me vendría bien alguien con tu experiencia médica.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really know you well enough. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: No te conozco lo suficiente, lo siento.

ESP.ORIGINAL: RSCharlieAudioLog2Audio
On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pensándoolo mejor, quédate conmigo un poco más.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great!
Actually, I'd like you to stick around.
ESP.TRADUIT: En realidad me gustaría que siguieras por aquí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
Ok, if that's what you want. I wonder if Doc Mitchell still needs a nurse?
ESP.TRADUIT: Bueno, si es lo que quieres... ¿Me pregunto si Doc Mitchell seguirá necesitando una enfermera?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgHome Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.LeftAngry to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set DelilahMREF.L38 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.ANovac to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Fort to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 DelilahMREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 Show Message DelilahMsgPerkRemoved Player.removeperk 00DelilahPerk ;Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude - 3 If PlayerREF.HasPerk DelilahMojaveMD == 1 playerREF.removeperk DelilahMojaveMD EndIf If Player.HasPerk EmergencySurgeon == 1 showmessage 00delilahmsglostes Player.RemovePerk emergencysurgeon endif DelilahMREF.evp
DelilahMREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade 00DelilahHomeMarkerREF
Yes, I'm sure.
Ok, I'm going to see if Julie can put me to work at the Old Mormon Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: Bueno, iré a ver si Julie me puede dar trabajo en la Antigua Fortaleza Mormona.

DelilahMREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade 00DelilahAngryHomeMarkerREF
Yes, I'm sure.
I'd like to buy some supplies.
The brass are pissed about the trouble you've been causing. Your caps are no good here.
With your reputation? Well, I won't say your caps are no good here... let's just say that they're... less good.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Con tu reputación? Mira, no es que no aceptemos tus chapas, pero digamos que valen... menos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: SHOWBARTERMENU -50
FollowersAcknowledgeMyOrder
You got it.
Don't fight unless I'm already engaged.
ESP.TRADUIT: No quiero que ataques a los enemigos a menos que yo les haya atacado.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. The last thing we need is a bloodbath.
ESP.TRADUIT: Bien. Lo último que necesitamos es una matanza.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DelilahMREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 DelilahMREF.SetAlert 0
Don't start fighting unless I do, got it?
I want you to be aggressive.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero que ataques a los enemigos en cuanto los veas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure there are other ways to handle this, but if you insist.
Set DelilahMREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
I want you to be aggressive.
Captain Gilles said to talk to you about medical aid for the camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: El capitán Gilles me dijo que hablara contigo para conseguir ayuda médica para el campamento.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Pleased}Hey, if you can help, I'll take whatever I can get. Doctor's Bags would be a huge help, but what I really need are medical texts.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Agradecida}Hey, if you can help, I'll take whatever I can get. Doctor's Bags would be a huge help, but what I really need are medical texts.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not trained to deal with major psychological trauma, and we've got a lot of kids in this camp.

SetObjectiveCompleted VMS36 30 1 SetStage VMS40 10
if Player.GetItemCount VBSPsychologyBook >=1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS40 20 1 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS40 20 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS40 30 1 else SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS40 20 1 endif
if Player.GetItemCount VBSPediatricsBook >=1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS40 40 1 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS40 40 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS40 50 1 else SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS40 40 1 endif
SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS40 60 1
Medical texts? Aren't you a doctor?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Textos de medicina? Pero si tú eres médico.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Frustrated, a little sad}I'm an Army field medic. I can treat bullet wounds, shrapnel, trenchfoot, no problem.
But this - the kids and the psychological trauma and all the rest - is out of my league.
< Medicine - 30 >
[SUCCEEDED] < whimper >
RewardXP 30 set VFreeformSloan.SnufflesHealed to 1 QJSnufflesRef.SetActorValue LeftMobilityCondition 100
[Clean the wound with antibiotics and expertly bind Snuffles' injured leg.]
[FAILED] < whimper >
[Do your best attempts at first aid to treat Snuffles' injured leg.]
How's it going?
< snuffle >
< sniff, sniff >
Hmmm... your leg appears to be injured.
ESP.TRADUIT: Mmm... Por lo que veo, tienes heridas en la pata.

ESP.ORIGINAL: < whine >
Goodbye.
<snuffle>
Here's the caps.
Have a seat in the Auto-Doc. This will take a few hours.
ESP.TRADUIT: Siéntate en el Auto-Dr. Esto tardará unas horas.

Sure.
What's up?
Alright.
I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me gustaría que de momento regresaras al Lucky 38.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright! That is a swank pad.

00DahliaWhoAreYou
I'm Delilah, and this is my place. I don't normally take too kindly to strangers barging in on me, but I happen to have helped the Doc save you.
ESP.TRADUIT: Soy Delilah, y estás en mi casa. Normalmente no suelo ser muy amable con los extraños que me encuentro, pero en este caso resulta que yo ayudé a Doc a salvar tu vida.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DelilahMREF.PlayerKnowsDelilah to 1
I'm a recovering gunshot victim with a raging headache. Who are you?
00DahliaGoodbye
Bye.
Nevermind. I'm getting out of here.
Let's go.
00DahliaWhoAreYou1
[SUCCEEDED] Flatterer. I'm jealous of the life of a courier. Seeing the wastes, it must be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: [SUPERADO] Adulador. I'm jealous of the life of a courier. Seeing the wastes, it must be great.

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 10 set DelilahMREF.PlayerKnowsDelilah to 1
Then it seems like I have a new hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: Entonces parece que tengo una nueva heroína.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Well, this isn't it. You don't have to leave. I think the life you lead is fascinating. I love to meet new and interesting people.
set DelilahMREF.PlayerKnowsDelilah to 1
Um.. this.. I was looking for.. er.. Doc Mitchell's place.
ESP.TRADUIT: Um... esto... estaba buscando... er... la casa de Doc Mitchell.

ESP.ORIGINAL: 00DahliaWhoAreYou2
Mainly I help Doc Mitchell around the clinic. I'm going to be a doctor one day, and I think I'll need more experience than what he can show me here.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pues principalmente ayudo a Doc Mitchell en su clínica. Voy a ser doctora algún día, y creo que necesito más experiencia de la que él puede darme aquí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DelilahMREF.PlayerKnowsDelilah to 1
What do you do here?
00DahliaWhoAreYou3
Ever since I lost Uncle Sulik, it hasn't really been the same. I think I need to strike out, and find my own destiny.
set DelilahMREF.PlayerKnowsDelilah to 1
Do you like it here?
00DahliaHerStory
00DahliaNevermind
Ok.
Let's talk about something else.
FollowersFiredANovac
Alright. That place is pretty gross though.

Yeah, go wait for me at the apartment in Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, espérame en el apartamento de Novac.

Ok.
Let's talk about something else.
00DahliaMedical
Of course. What's going on?
I think I need some medical treatment.
Of course, what's going on?
show message delilahMedicalMenu
I think I need some medical attention.
00DahliaMedicalHeal
Yeah you are. Let's get you fixed up.
delilahMREF.RemoveItem BloodPack 1
