I'm hurt.
You look fine to me.
I'm hurt.
Oh my god you've lost alot of blood! I can't believe you're still on your feet. Just relax and let me take care of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Dios mío, has perdido mucha sangre! No puedo creer que sigas en pie. Relájate y deja que me ocupe de esto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: DelilahMREF.RemoveItem BloodPack 1
StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical SetStage VDoctors 10 DelilahMREF.evp
I'm hurt.
Ow, I bet that hurts. Let's get you patched up.
delilahMREF.removeitem bloodpack 1
StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical SetStage VDoctors 10 DelilahMREF.evp
I'm hurt.
Yeah you could use a little help.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, no te vendría mal un poco de ayuda.

ESP.ORIGINAL: delilahmref.removeitem bloodpack 1
StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahTestMedical SetStage VDoctors 10 DelilahMREF.evp
I'm hurt.
Yeah you are. I'll need a Blood Pack to treat you properly.
I'm hurt.
00DahliaMedicalHealYes
Oh good! This should only take a second.
playerref.removeitem bloodpack 1
StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest PlaySound NPCHumanUsingRadaway set GameHour to (GameHour + 1) Player.ResetHealth showmessage 00DelilahMsgTreatHealth
I have one here.
00DahliaMedicalHealNo
Oh, we definitely need to find some of those.
I don't have any Blood Packs.
00DahliaMedicalAddicted
Sure. You really should stay away from that stuff though. I'll need a dose of Fixer.
I can't shake this addiction. Could you help?
Yeah, I think I've got a Fixer right here. You really shouldn't take the hard stuff like that though.

DelilahMREF.removeitem NVfixer 1 StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest PlaySound NPCHumanDrinkingBottleGulp set GameHour to (GameHour + 1)
SetStage vDoctors 20 ShowMessage AddictionRemovalMsg Set Generic.Addicted to 0
I can't shake this addiction. Could you help?
00DahliaMedicalAddictedYes
{Sarcastic} Sure thing buddy. Just drink this in one big gulp.
playerREF.removeitem NVFixer 1
StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest PlaySound NPCHumanDrinkingBottleGulp set GameHour to (GameHour + 1) SetStage vDoctors 20 ShowMessage AddictionRemovalMsg Set Generic.Addicted to 0
Here you go. I'm going to stay clean this time, I promise.
00DahliaMedicalAddictedNo
Whatever you say, but you can only chase the dragon so long, man, before the dragon catches you.
Nevermind, I can quit whenever I want.
00DahliaMedicalLimbs
00DahliaMedicalLimbsYes
00DahliaMedicalLimbsNo
Just let me know when you do.
I don't have everything you need.
00DahliaMedicalRadiation
Even a tiny bit of nuclear radiation can be highly toxic. We'll need to treat you right away to prevent any long-term damage.
StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest set GameHour to (GameHour + 1) PlaySound NPCHumanDrinkingBottleGulp SetStage vDoctors 30 showmessage 00DelilahMsgTreatRads
I think I've got radiation poisoning.
I can't find any signs that you're irradiated. Are you sure you're not high?
I think I've got radiation sickness.
Aw gee, do you think so? You look like Chernobyl.
StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest set GameHour to (GameHour + 1) PlaySound NPCHumanDrinkingBottleGulp SetStage vDoctors 30 showmessage 00DelilahMsgTreatRads
I think I've been exposed to radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: Creo que he tragado algo de radiación.

ESP.ORIGINAL: 00DahliaMedicalRadiationNo
00DahliaMedicalRadiationYes
My friend Delilah is trying to learn as much as she can about medicine. Could you help her?
Sure, I think I could show her a thing or two. Requisite of course on you making a donation of say.. 500 caps to the clinic?
Well, we do offer a Wasteland Medical Survival course for friends of the Followers. Give me a minute to clear my schedule, this will take awhile.

DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahUsanagi DoctorUsanagiREF.AddScriptPackage 00NPCTeachDelilah Set DelilahMREF.MetUsanagi to 1 ;ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgMetUsanagi RewardXP 50 SetObjectiveCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 10 1 StartQuest DelilahUsanagiTimerQuest DelilahMREF.AddItem Bloodpack 10
00DahliaMeetUsanagi1
Thank you for your generous donation. Just give me a second to clear my schedule, and then this should take the better part of the day.
player.RemoveItem caps001 500 AddReputation RepNVFollowers 1 1 set vDialogueMedicalClinic.bPlayerMadeDonation to 1

DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahUsanagi DoctorUsanagiREF.AddScriptPackage 00NPCTeachDelilah Set DelilahMREF.MetUsanagi to 1 ;ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgMetUsanagi RewardXP 50 SetObjectiveCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 10 1 StartQuest DelilahUsanagiTimerQuest DelilahMREF.AddItem Bloodpack 10
Sure, that's more than fair. Here's the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: Claro, es bastante justo. Aquí tienes las chapas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: 00DahliaMeetUsanagi2
Ok, well just let me know when you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: Vale, pues avísame cuando las tengas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have that many caps right now.
00DahliaMeetHenry
I hope you're not suggesting I teach her. I'm far too busy to take on any students.
ESP.TRADUIT: Espero que no estés sugiriendo que le de clases. Estoy demasiado ocupado para atender estudiantes.

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is my friend Delilah. We were hoping you could show her a thing or two about medicine.
ESP.TRADUIT: Esta es mi amiga Delilah. Esperábamos que pudieras enseñarle un par de cosas sobre medicina.

ESP.ORIGINAL: 00DahliaMeetHenry1
[SUCCEEDED] Ah, what the hell, you're right. Are you ready now kid? Let's get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: [SUPERADO] Ah, qué demonios, tienes razón. ¿Estás preparada, niña? Vamos a empezar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahSchuler LindaSchulerREF.AddScriptPackage 00NPCTeachDelilah Set DelilahMREF.MetSchuler to 1 RewardXP 50 SetObjectiveCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 19 1 StartQuest DelilahSchulerTimerQuest
Three hours of your time could save countless lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: Tres horas de tu tiempo podrían salvar muchas vidas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I really don't have the time for this nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NO SUPERADO] No tengo tiempo para estas tonterías.

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would really help me out though, Doc!
00DahliaMeetHenry2
00DahliaMeetFarkas
With everything going on, I just don't have the time right now. Maybe later.
This is my friend Delilah. Do you think you could teach her some basic medical care?
For you, of course I can spare the time. Are you ready, Delilah?

DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahFarkas VFSJulieFarkasREF.AddScriptPackage 00NPCTeachDelilah Set DelilahMREF.MetFarkas to 1 ;ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgMetFarkas RewardXP 50 SetObjectiveCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 5 1 StartQuest DelilahFarkasTimerQuest
This is my friend Delilah. Do you think you could teach her some basic medical care?
00DahliaMeetFarkas1
00DahliaMeetKemp
I really shouldnt --
Hey Doc, could you help my friend Delilah with her medical training?
Maybe you didn't hear me the first time. No service for scumbags!
As a doctor, you're obligated to teach Delilah something useful. Don't forget about your oath.
The brass are pissed about the trouble you've been causing. Your caps are no good here.
Could you teach my friend some medicine?
00DahliaHotPlate
Sure.
Delilah, could you help me make some medicine?
00DahliaHaircut
00DahliaGoals
I'd like to learn more advanced medicine. I've learned alot from Sulik and Doc Mitchell, but I'm ready to learn even more.
I also love to read. It's my Dad's legacy to me. We always read together, and he had this list of books he wanted to find.
Hopefully we can find some of them out here. Keep your eyes peeled for me?
playerref.additem 00delilahbookwishlist 1
So what are your goals out here in the wasteland?
Ok, what about them?
Let's talk about your goals.
00DahliaGoalsDoctor
The Old Mormon Fort and New Vegas Medical Clinic almost certainly will have someone on staff that can give me some pointers and basic tips.
I'm a really fast learner, so maybe visiting doctors around the Mojave would be our best bet. I can probably pick up some tricks pretty quickly.
And of course, they're doctors. There will probably be some kind of bill involved, but we'll cross that bridge when we come to it.
StartQuest 00DelilahMedicalDialogue if (playerref.getitemcount 00delilahMedkit == 0) playerref.additem 00DelilahMedKit 1 endif
setobjectivedisplayed 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 5 1 setobjectivedisplayed 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 12 1
Where can we get you medical training?
00DahliaGoalsBooks
I'm not really sure. I was kind of just hoping to stumble across them. Junk vendors, old people.. maybe the Followers have a library? I don't know.
I know that's not much help, but I'm sure we'll find something. Let's not make that a top priority.
Where should we look for books?
00FollowerLetsGo
Okay.
Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 DelilahMREF.evp
Let's head out.
00FollowersHired
00DahliaBooks9
Thanks, I've always wanted to read this one.

PlayerREF.removeitem 00DelilahFALBook 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahFALBook 1 ;Set DelilahMREF.PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
StartQuest DelilahReadingGrapesQuest Set DelilahReadingFALQuest.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahReadingFAL
This book's definitely on your list. Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas.
00DahliaLabCoat
I know. I need a lab coat. I'd really like one from the Followers. Do you think they would just give me one?
StartQuest 00DelilahLabCoat
SetObjectiveDisplayed 00DelilahLabCoat 5 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed 00DelilahLabCoat 6 1
You still don't exactly look like a doctor.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sigues sin tener pinta de doctora.

ESP.ORIGINAL: 00DahliaLabCoat1
I figured it would be something like that.What do you think? Should I join them? They seem to be doing alot of good for the Mojave.
You probably have to join up with them.
00DahliaLabCoat2
Maybe you're right. I just want it to look authentic, you know? Maybe I really just want the credibility of having a group behind me.
I like the uniform and the thought of being a part of something big like that too. I think I should join them.
We can find a lab coat anywhere.
00DahliaLabCoat3
In that case, can we stop by the Old Mormon Fort when we get a chance? I'd really like to talk to Julie about signing up.
Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1
startquest 00delilahlabcoat setstage 00delilahlabcoat 5 setobjectivedisplayed 00delilahlabcoat 5 1
I think you joining them is a great idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me parece buena idea que te unas a ellos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: 00DahliaLabCoat4
Why would you say that? The Followers do a lot of good for people. The kind of good I can do for people. Help me make that a reality.
Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude - 1
I think the Followers are a bunch of creeps. You should avoid them all together.
00DahliaMedicalPoison
Ok, hold still.
PlayerREF.CIOS NVAntivenom
StartQuest 00DelilahTimerQuest PlaySound NPCHumanUsingJet set GameHour to (GameHour + 1) showmessage PoisonRemovalMsg
I don't feel so well..
00DahliaMedicalPoisonYes
00DahliaMedicalPoisonNo
00DahliaMeetStrauss
I can do it for 500 caps, I've got make a living.
ESP.TRADUIT: Puedo hacerlo por 500 chapas, tengo que ganarme la vida.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey Ada, this is my friend Delilah, and she's hoping to get some wasteland medical training.
00DahliaMeetStrauss1
[FAILED] Nice try. I'll also be training my competition. It'll cost you 500, I'm not budging.
But if you don't train her, that's one less doctor out there saving lives.
[SUCCEEDED] Maybe you're right. I guess I can handle 250. Are you ready, Delilah?
playerref.removeitem caps001 250

DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahStrauss AdaStrausREF.AddScriptPackage 00NPCTeachDelilah Set DelilahMREF.MetStraus to 1 RewardXP 50 SetObjectiveCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 15 1 StartQuest DelilahStrausTimerQuest
How about 250? The Mojave needs as many doctors as it can get. You know that, Ada. And she's good.
00DahliaMeetStrauss2
Oh, I believe I'm game for that.
AdaStrausREF.PlayIdle LooseHandsOnHeart

DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahStrauss AdaStrausREF.AddScriptPackage 00NPCTeachDelilah Set DelilahMREF.MetStraus to 1 ;ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgMetGunnarsson RewardXP 50 SetObjectiveCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 15 1 StartQuest DelilahStrausSexTimerQuest
Maybe I could show you a thing or two in trade?
Oh yes, I think we can.
AdaStrausREF.PlayIdle LooseHandsOnHeart

DelilahMREF.AddScriptPackage 00DelilahStrauss AdaStrausREF.AddScriptPackage 00NPCTeachDelilah Set DelilahMREF.MetStraus to 1 ;ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgMetGunnarsson RewardXP 50 SetObjectiveCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue 15 1 StartQuest DelilahStrausSexTimerQuest
Maybe you and I could work something out on the side?
00DahliaLabCoat5
Thanks. I can't wait!
Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1
Of course. We'll head there at the first opportunity.
00DahliaLabCoat6
Can't you at least just give them the benefit of the doubt?Just a quick trip. For me? I feel like I really belong here!
I think they have sinister ulterior motives. I just can't trust them.
00DahliaLabCoat6Yes
Thank you so much! I promise you'll see how it's all worth it. I've always wanted to belong somewhere.
Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1
startquest 00delilahlabcoat setstage 00delilahlabcoat 5 setobjectivedisplayed 00delilahlabcoat 5 1
Of course, we can go there. Just don't expect me to like it.
00DahliaLabCoat6No
Fine! I will! I'll be there if you feel like catching up, asshole.

ShowMessage DelilahLeftAngryMsg Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.LeftAngry to 1 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set DelilahMREF.L38 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.ANovac to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Fort to 1 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 DelilahMREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 ShowMessage DelilahMsgPerkRemoved Player.removeperk 00DelilahPerk Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude - 3 If PlayerREF.HasPerk DelilahMojaveMD == 1 playerREF.removeperk DelilahMojaveMD EndIf If Player.HasPerk EmergencySurgeon == 1 showmessage 00delilahmsglostes Player.RemovePerk emergencysurgeon endif DelilahMREF.evp
DelilahMREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade 00DelilahAngryHomeMarkerREF
No. There's something wrong with you if buy into their bullshit. Go join a cult if you want to.
00DahliaLabCoat99
Oh really? I can't express in words how much this means to me! Thank you so much!
player.removeitem OutfitFollowersDoctorUnique 1 delilahmref.additem OutfitFollowersDoctorUnique 1 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 2
StartQuest 00DelilahLabCoat setstage 00DelilahLabCoat 10 setobjectivecompleted 00DelilahLabCoat 10 1 StopQuest 00DelilahLabCoat
Here. Have mine, I don't need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: Toma. Quédate el mío, yo no lo necesito.

ESP.ORIGINAL: 01DelilahJoinFollowers
Well, we're always looking for new members. Someone with her background and talents would be very welcome here.
Delilah is interested in joining the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: Delilah está interesada en unirse a los Seguidores.

ESP.ORIGINAL: 01DelilahJoinFollowers1
Definitely. I believe Delilah to be a special girl with a bright medical career ahead of her. You would be wise to nurture that.
Go ahead and give her these, and let her know that she is welcome here anytime she chooses.
As a matter of fact, I have her first assignment right here. Tell her to read this mission briefing and report back to me when she finished. Thanks.
TrembleREF.enable ng1ref.enable ng2ref.enable ng3ref.enable ng4ref.enable ng5ref.enable ng6ref.enable ng7ref.enable ng8ref.enable
playerref.additem 00delilahlabcoatarmor 1 playerref.additem safehousefollowerskey 1 playerref.additem 00delilahfollowersnote 1 DelilahMREF.evp
So I can tell her it's a yes, then?
01DelilahJoinFollowers2
Of course. Some of our best work is done by our liasons. She will maintain full membership status, and be free to travel the Mojave with you.
As a matter of fact, I have her first assignment right here. Tell her to read this mission briefing and report back to me when she finished. Thanks.
Can she still travel with me?
01DelilahJoinFollowers3
Thank you, Doctor Farkas.
01DelilahJoinFollowers4
Of course. We can find plenty of uses for her talents.

ShowMessage 00DelilahMsgFort Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.LeftAngry to 1 Set VNPCFollowers.bHumanoidInParty to 0 set VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers to (VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers - 1) if VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers == 0 set VNPCFollowers.bPlayerHasFollower to 0 endif Set DelilahMREF.Fort to 1 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set DelilahMREF.L38 to 1 Set DelilahMREF.ANovac to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 DelilahMREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 Show Message DelilahMsgPerkRemoved Player.removeperk 00DelilahPerk
DelilahMREF.evp
DelilahMREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade 00DelilahAngryHomeMarkerREF
I think I'd like to just leave her here if you don't mind.
00DelilahLeftAngry
I'm sorry I got so out of hand. I have a serious temper, and I know it. If you can apologize, I'd be happy to head out with you again.
You shouldn't have left like that.
00DelilahLeftAngryNo
Wow, really? I'm sorry it has to be this way. I'll be here if you decide to grow up.
Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude - 10
I was right. I have nothing to apologize for.
00DelilahLeftAngryYes
I'd love to!

Set DelilahMREF.Waiting to 0 Set DelilahMREF.LeftAngry to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Relax to 0 Set DelilahMREF.HasBeenHired to 1 Set DelilahMREF.HiredAgain to 1 Set DelilahMREF.L38 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.ANovac to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Fort to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DelilahMREF.IsFollowingClose to 0 Set DelilahMREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set DelilahMREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 DelilahMREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 DelilahMREF.SetPlayerTeammate 1 DelilahMREF.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 DelilahMREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 2 DelilahMREF.evp

ShowMessage FollowerMessagePerkDelilahAdd playerREF.addperk 00DelilahPerk If Player.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahMedicalDialogue == 1 Player.AddPerk delilahmojavemd showmessage delilahmsgmojavemd EndIf If Player.GetQuestCompleted 00DelilahNiptonQuest == 1 Player.AddPerk EmergencySurgeon ShowMessage followermessageperkdelilahes EndIf DelilahMREF.EVP
I'm sorry for how I acted. Would you like to come with me again?
00DahliaBooks1
I thought I would never see that book! My hero.

PlayerREF.removeitem 00DahliaParadiseLost 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DahliaParadiseLost 1 ;Set 00DelilahDialogue.PlayerHasBook to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 2 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1
StartQuest DelilahBooks Set DelilahBooks.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahBookRead1
Jason Bright gave up this old copy of Paradise Lost. It's on your list right?
00DahliaBooks2
Oh, I've heard that this is an amazing story. I can't wait to read it!

StartQuest Delilah1BookRead PlayerREF.removeitem 00DelilahBook2 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahBook2 1 Set DelilahMREF.PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
StartQuest Delilah1BookRead Set Delilah1BookRead.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahReadingCatcher
I've got a present for you. The Catcher in the Rye, by JD Salinger.
00DahliaBooks3
Ooh. On the Road, huh, just like us. I'll get into this one.

PlayerREF.removeitem 00DelilahOTRBook 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahOTRBook 1 ;Set DelilahMREF.PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
StartQuest DelilahReadingOTRQuest Set DelilahReadingOTRQuest.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahReadingOTR
On the Road is on your list right? I found it.
00DahliaBooks4
Oh, uh, the Canterbury Tales. Looks kind of hard to read, but I'll give it a shot!
ESP.TRADUIT: Oh, uh, los Cuentos de Canterbury. Parece algo pesado de leer, ¡pero lo intentaré!

ESP.ORIGINAL: PlayerREF.removeitem 00DelilahTalesBook 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahTalesBook 1 ;Set DelilahMREF.PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
StartQuest DelilahReadingTalesQuest Set DelilahReadingTalesQuest.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahReadingTales
You want this copy of the Canterbury Tales?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Quieres esta copia de los Cuentos de Canterbury?

ESP.ORIGINAL: 00DahliaBooks5
Ender's Game. This book won something called a Hugo award. I love it! Thank you!

PlayerREF.removeitem 00DelilahEnderBook 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahEnderBook 1 ;Set DelilahMREF.PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
StartQuest DelilahReadingEnderQuest Set DelilahReadingEnderQuest.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahReadingEnder
I found one of the books on your list.
00DahliaBooks6
Flowers for Algernon, I've always wanted to read this one. Thank you!

PlayerREF.removeitem 00DelilahFlowersBook 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahFlowersBook 1 ;Set DelilahMREF.PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
StartQuest DelilahReadingFlowersQuest Set DelilahReadingFlowersQuest.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahReadingFlowers
Here's Flowers for Algernon. Another one from your list.
00DahliaBooks7
This is great! Gray's Anatomy was pre-war canon for doctors! I can't wait to show Julie!

PlayerREF.removeitem 00DelilahGraysBook 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahGraysBook 1 ;Set DelilahMREF.PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
StartQuest DelilahReadingGraysQuest Set DelilahReadingGraysQuest.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahReadingGrays
I'll be glad we found this one. It's huge. Here you go.
00DahliaBooks8
Hm. No grapes on the cover. This one should be interesting.

PlayerREF.removeitem 00DelilahGrapesBook 1 DelilahMREF.additem 00DelilahGrapesBook 1 ;Set DelilahMREF.PlayerHasBook1 to 0 Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.DelilahHasBook to 1 DelilahMREF.evp
StartQuest DelilahReadingGrapesQuest Set DelilahReadingGrapesQuest.DelilahStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed DelilahMREF.AddNote DelilahReadingGrapes
The Grapes of Wrath. Here. That's a ridiculous title.
Can we talk about your books?
I already have one right now. Remind me when I finish.
Ok, did you find one?
00DelilahLet'sTalkAboutYou
What do you want to know?
Let's talk about you.
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou1
My mom went into the Clearing when I was five, and Dad raised me here in Goodsprings. Uncle Sulik lived with us too, and we lived a good life.
Dad taught me to read. We read every night, and he told me wonderful stories about books we would probably never see again.
Dad didn't only teach me to read books though. He taught me to read people too. He left me this gun in case I ever read something I didn't like.
I spent most of my childhood either learning tribal remedies from Sulik or reading and shooting with my dad.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me pasé casi toda mi infancia aprendiendo remedios tribales de Sulik y leyendo y disparando con mi padre.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost Dad five years ago, and Sulik last year. I guess the only thing I have left here is this house. Doc Mitchell I guess, but he's such a perv.
Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1 Set DelilahMREF.PlayerKnowsDelilahStory to 1
What's your story?
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou2
Uncle Sulik taught me a lot about the ways of his people, and I admire them in a lot of ways. I don't consider myself a "tribal" though.
Set DelilahMREF.PlayerKnowsDelilahStory to 1
Are you a tribal?
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou3
I'm decent with handguns, and I can certainly swing my bat pretty well. I prefer not fighting to fighting, though. Just so you know.
I'll try anything out, but I've never really been known for taking alot of punishment. I'm delicate. Sunny calls me 'Powderpuff'.
What kind of weapons can you use?
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou5
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou4
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou1A
My parents were from California. They came all the way to Goodsprings in search of their own little piece of heaven. I was born here.
So you're from California?
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou1B
Mitchell's AutoDoc said pancreatic cancer. I'd rather not really talk about that if you don't mind.
What happened to your mom?
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou1C
I'm going to be. I help Doc Mitchell out, and Sulik taught me some tribal methods, but I will be a doctor one day.
Set DelilahMREF.Attitude to DelilahMREF.Attitude + 1
You're a doctor?
00DelilahLetsTalkAboutYou2A

00VDTimedChatter
Sulik used to say that we all have two wolves battling inside of us; a good wolf and an evil wolf. The one that wins is the one we feed.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sulik solía decir que todos tenemos a dos lobos luchando dentro de nosotros; un lobo bueno y un lobo malo. El que gana es al que alimentamos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me know if you see any Broc Flowers blooming. I can use them.
ESP.TRADUIT: Avísame si ves flores de broquia por ahí, puedo aprovecharlas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was a kid, Dad told me the legend of Deadeye Cedrick. Cedrick had lost both eyes, but could hit a bottlecap in midair with his Hunting Rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: Cuando era pequeña, papá me contó la leyenda de Deadeye Cedrick. Cedrick perdió los dos ojos, pero seguía pudiendo disparar a una chapa en el aire con su rifle de caza.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful in the shade. Scorpions like to hide out in the dark during the hottest parts of the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ten cuidado en las sombras. A los escorpiones les gusta esconderse en sitios oscuros durante las partes más calurosas del día.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish we could find somewhere to go swimming.
Keep your eyes peeled for Xander Root. Ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: Avísame si encuentras raíz de xandria, ¿vale?

ESP.ORIGINAL: We might be able to find some Nevada Agave around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: Puede que encontremos algo de agave de Nevada por aquí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Traveling with you has been some of the best medical experience I could ask for. You're a bullet magnet.
ESP.TRADUIT: Viajar contigo ha sido la mejor experiencia médica que podría pedir. Eres un imán para las balas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard there are RadScorpions that can get as a big as a trailer. {Shudder} Eww. That gives me the creeps just thinking of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: He oído que hay mutascorpios del tamaño de un camión {se estremece} Ughh. Solo pensarlo me da escalofríos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't think there are any Radscorpions in here do you?
{sarcastic}Some of the older Fiends would make great research cases. I think they've managed to preserve their organs with all the chemicals they've ingested.
Next time we stop I should organize our medical supplies.
It doesn't take much more than some hillbillies and the smell of Brahmin dung to remind a girl why she left home.
{giggle}
{giggle}
I've heard these guys carry hard to find medical books. Can we look?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't wait to show off my new lab coat! Even Doc Mitchell is going to be jealous.

I sure could use a drink. I bet Trudy would be happy to see us.

He has numerous health problems, but I haven't seen him in awhile. I hope he's still alive. If you could check on him, I would really appreciate it.
setobjectivecompleted 00delilahniptonquest 15 1

Shame. Maybe prudence is the better part of value in the medical profession. We all lose one sometimes, don't beat yourselves up about it too badly.

This man appears to be suffering from multiple machete wounds. Improper treatment will kill him. Would you like to treat him? (Medicine 35 or higher required)
Alternatively, if you have Med-X, Whiskey, and Surgical Tubing you may be able to treat him.
ESP.TRADUIT:
Al parecer, este hombre presenta múltiples heridas de machete. Un tratamiento equivocado lo mataría. ¿Seguro que quieres tratarlo? (Se necesita Medicina 35 o superior)
A lo mejor también podrías tratarlo con Med-X, whisky y un tubo quirúrgico, si es que tienes.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave him alone.
Attempt to treat with medicine.
Use medical equipment to treat.
Allow Delilah to treat him.

Delilah has finished reading Catcher in the Rye. Her Perception has increased by 1.
"This fall I think you're riding for - it's a special kind of fall, a horrible kind. The man falling isn't permitted to feel or hear himself hit bottom. He just keeps falling and falling. The whole arrangement's designed for men who, at some time or other in their lives, were looking for something their own environment couldn't supply them with. Or they thought their own environment couldn't supply them with. So they gave up looking. They gave it up before they ever really even got started." -JD Salinger; The Catcher in the Rye

Delilah has finished reading On the Road. Her Agility has increased by 1.
"I realized these were all the snapshots which our children would look at someday with wonder, thinking their parents had lived smooth, well-ordered lives and got up in the morning to walk proudly on the sidewalks of life, never dreaming the raggedy madness and riot of our actual lives, our actual night, the hell of it, the senseless emptiness." Jack Kerouac; On the Road

Pendleton appears to be suffering from acute congestive heart failure. His breathing is very labored and he appears unable to get up from the bed. ESP.ORIGINAL: The blockages proved too difficult for Delilah to remove. Pendleton's condition has worsened significantly.
Delilah's limited medical knowledge, combined with the patient's advanced age, has caused him to crash on the table. CPR was ineffective at resucitating him, and the patient expired.
As Delilah begins the incision, Pendleton begins to go into convulsions. He has gone into anaphalactic shock, and the surgery must be aborted.
After a thorough examination, Delilah does not feel comfortable that she could succesfully perform the operation.
The surgery was a success! The patient is in stable condition and expected to make a full recovery.

Delilah has finished reading Gray's Anatomy. She has gained the Finesse perk.
"The term human anatomy comprises a consideration of the various structures which make up the human organism. In a restricted sense it deals merely with the which for the fully developed individual and which can be rendered evident to the naked eye by various methods of dissection." Henry Gray; Gray's Anatomy

Delilah has finished reading The Canterbury Tales. Her Strength has increased by 1.
"Well may a man in sickness wail and weep/ Who has no wife to nurse him and to keep/ His house for him; do wisely then and search/ For one and lover her/ As Christ loves his Church/For if you love yourself you love your wife/ For no one hates his flesh, nay all his life/ He fosters it, and so I bid you wive/ And cherish her, or you will never thrive/ Husband and wife, whatever the worldly say/ In ribald jest, are on the straight sure way." Geoffrey Chaucer The Canterbury Tales; The Merchant's Tale

Delilah has left in a fit. She is more than likely at the Old Mormon Fort in Freeside, if you want to go talk to her.

After a thourough examination, this man seems to have fractured several vertebrate in his spine. His body is going into shock, and he will probably not live very long in this condition. He needs immediate surgery. Delilah will need a Medical Brace in order to set the spine after the extremely delicate surgery. (You or Delilah must have a Medicine skill of 85 or higher and a Medical Brace to complete the surgery).
Delilah's Medicine: %.0f
Never mind. Leave him alone.
Help Delilah prep him for surgery.
[Medicine] Oversee the surgery.
During the surgery, Delilah's hand slips and severs an important nerve in Cornfed's back. He is still alive, but barely, when she closes him up.
Cornfed almost immediately begins seizing as the operation gets underway. Despite Delilah's best efforts, the patient expires on the table.
Once Delilah opens up Cornfed's back, she realizes the damage was far more extensive than she thought. There is nothing she will be able to do for him. He will be paralyzed for life.

Immediately after opening the patient up, Delilah notices signs of secondary infection. She treats this with antibiotics, and closes him back up. The infection would have killed him, but he will probably remain paralyzed.

The surgery was a success! The patient is in stable condition. A secondary infection in the patients soft tissue was found and treated, probably saving his life, as well as cleaning up the bone fragments from the fracture. Cornfed still has a long road ahead of him, but he will survive his injuries.
Delilah has left your party. She has gone to the Old Mormon Fort in Freeside to help out.

Delilah has finished reading Paradise Lost. Her Charisma has increased by 1.
"Into this wild Abyss/ The womb of Nature, and perhaps her grave/ Of neither sea, nor shore, nor air, nor fire,/ But all of these in their pregnant causes mixed/ Confusedly, and which thus must ever fight,/ Unless the Almighty Maker them ordain/ His dark materials to create more worlds,/ Into this wild Abyss the wary Fiend/ Stood on the brink of Hell and looked a while,/ Pondering his voyage; for no narrow frith/ He had to cross." John Milton; Paradise Lost
ESP.TRADUIT:
Delilah ha terminado de leer Paraíso Perdido. Su carisma aumenta en 1 punto.
"En aquel hórrido abismo, cuna de la Naturaleza y tal vez su tumba, que no es ni mar ni tierra, ni aire, ni fuego, sino mezcla de todos los elementos, los cuales confundidos en sus fecundos gérmenes deben luchar así perpetuamente, a no ser que el Creador Supremo destine sus impuros materiales a la formación de nuevos mundos; en aquel hórrido abismo, al borde del infierno, se detuvo el cauteloso Satán, y lo contempló algún tiempo reflexionando en su viaje, pues no era un pequeño estrecho el que tenía que atravesar." John Milton; Paraíso Perdido

This old man appears fine from outward appearances. He is not conscious. After inspecting his pupils, Delilah determines that he is suffering from an aneurysm. He will require very dangerous brain surgery.The surgery will be very risky, and he may not make it, but it needs to be done now. (You or Delilah must have a Medicine score of 95 and a Bonesaw to sucessfully complete the surgery).
Delilah's Medicine: %.0f
Leave him alone.
Help Delilah prep him for surgery.
[Medicine] Oversee the surgery.
During the surgery, a portion of Ol' Drybones' brain was starved of oxygen. He will almost certainly suffer brain damage.
As Delilah begins working on flushing the aneurysm, Ol' Drybones expires on the table.
After opening Drybones' cranium, Delilah finds that the aneurysm is the size of a grape. It is too large to safely remove.

Lady seems to really like Delilah. It looks like she'll be traveling with you guys for awhile. She's just a puppy, so it might be a good idea to talk to Delilah about making her essential. [ Lady can be told to wait at numerous locations through Delilah's dialogue, otherwise she will follow Delilah. ]
ESP.TRADUIT: A Lady le gusta mucho Delilah. Parece que os acompañará un tiempo. Es solo un cachorro, así que podría ser buena idea hablar con Delilah sobre convertirla en esencial. [ Puedes hacer que Lady espere en muchos sitios a través del diálogo con Delilah, de lo contrario seguirá a Delilah. ]
